code: import React,{useEffect,useState,useRef}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../../styles/ThreePL.css";/* ===== IMAGE IMPORTS (gallery18‚Äì41) ===== */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const images=[];for(let i=18;i<=41;i++){images.push(require("../../assets/gallery/images/gallery".concat(i,".jpg")));}function ThreePL(){const[heroIndex,setHeroIndex]=useState(0);const[mainIndex,setMainIndex]=useState(0);const sectionsRef=useRef([]);/* HERO SLIDESHOW */useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>{setHeroIndex(i=>(i+1)%images.length);},4500);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[]);/* MAIN SLIDESHOW */useEffect(()=>{const timer=setInterval(()=>{setMainIndex(i=>(i+1)%images.length);},3500);return()=>clearInterval(timer);},[]);/* SCROLL REVEAL */useEffect(()=>{const observer=new IntersectionObserver(entries=>{entries.forEach(e=>{if(e.isIntersecting)e.target.classList.add("visible");});},{threshold:0.15});sectionsRef.current.forEach(sec=>sec&&observer.observe(sec));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"rgm-3pl-page",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"rgm-3pl-hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"hero-image-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[heroIndex],alt:"RGM Logistics Hero"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"RGM Logistics"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Reliable \u2022 Transparent \u2022 Family-Driven Third-Party Logistics"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"rgm-3pl-intro reveal",ref:el=>sectionsRef.current[0]=el,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("blockquote",{children:["\u201CEven at the last minute, we can rely on RGM to find the right solution. Communication is clear, honest, and dependable \u2014 it truly feels like working with a partner.\u201D",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"\u2014 RGM Logistics Partner"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"rgm-3pl-main reveal",ref:el=>sectionsRef.current[1]=el,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Flatbed Logistics In Action"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-slideshow-frame",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:images[mainIndex],alt:"RGM Flatbed Operations"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"rgm-3pl-advantages",children:[["üöõ Flatbed Expertise","Built exclusively for flatbed logistics."],["üí∞ Smarter Pricing","Optimized flatbed routing & partnerships."],["üéØ Specialized Freight","Construction, steel & machinery loads."],["‚≠ê Reliable Delivery","Clear communication & trusted carriers."]].map((_ref,i)=>{let[title,text]=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"adv-card reveal",ref:el=>sectionsRef.current[i+2]=el,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:text})]},i);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"rgm-3pl-cta reveal",ref:el=>sectionsRef.current[6]=el,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Let\u2019s Move Your Flatbed Freight Forward"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Flatbed logistics built on trust, communication, and family values."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cta-buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"cta-primary",children:"Get A Quote"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contact",className:"cta-secondary",children:"Click to Call"})]})]})]});}export default ThreePL;
